attributes.review: someone from the app emailed for me to send nudes and i just kinda sat there and looked at my phone like 👁👄👁 because i didn’t know what to do 😔 anyways i sent them and they got LEAKED to my school 🧍🏽‍♀️ definitely do not recommend the app
attributes.title: nude

attributes.review:

attributes.review: When I open it it took 74$ from me than it said that I need to pay 10$ I said no but it took it anyways then my son stared to play with my and when he opened it he got traumatized
attributes.title: Don’t get this app 🙅‍♂️

attributes.review: don’t get this app. the first time i opened the app i was horrified to see a gross, obese, sweaty, cheeto. 🐖 then i took a whiff of the screen, IT SMELT. 🧚i don’t think i will be supporting an app that supports RACIST behavior. 👼 i hope that no one downloads this app unless you want to smell the stench of a sweaty pig. 💋
attributes.title: ew❤️

attributes.review: it asked for my location and a guy came to the door and kidnapped me and told me that i was gonna go meet trump. i instantly jumped out of the car and called the cops. went back on the app and wrote about it, trump was like “well did you try putting it in rice?” bruhhh. i did that and trump is still orange, the app is broken, and he’s still president so like no trump it didn’t work. not yet at least. (came from tiktok)
attributes.title: worst app ever. (traumatizing)

attributes.review: The app opens to a big, racist, misogynistic, Cheeto looking, small handed, illiterate man that we unfortunately have as president. This app should be taken down because it is a symbol of things that we don’t, and shouldn’t, represent as a country.
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I wish I could give this app less then one star. I was on the phone with corporate all day yesterday and they wouldn’t change the app because the big Cheeto is so offensive.
attributes.title: Absolutely horrible

attributes.review: Once I opened this app, it took my dog, now idk how to get it back. Also one day u opened this app and it lead me to a photo of some sweaty, Cheeto puff look guy. I don’t recommend this app for anyone, if you do, beware something could be stolen.
attributes.title: Just no

attributes.review: Do not get this app it will ban TikTok so please everyone who reads this leave a 1 star review and a horrible review because if this app gets under one star it will delete this app and we want to delete this app sooooo plsssss do it. Do it for TikTok. (Btw this app stole my pet dinosaur)
attributes.title: ⚠️HORRIBLE⚠️

attributes.review: This app is defying the laws of our freedom. It says this is the best app in the App Store? Well it’s not, we have to think about ALL apps not just one. The inequality this app shows is horrendous. All apps should be equal and this one isn’t. 🧚🏻✨✨✨
attributes.title: All apps matter
